product.name: The Butterfly Garden (The Collector Series)
product.description: Near an isolated mansion lies a beautiful garden.In this garden grow luscious flowers, shady trees…and a collection of recious “butterflies”—young women who have been kidnaed and intricately tattooed to resemble their namesakes. Overseeing it all is the Gardener, a brutal, twisted man obsessed with caturing and reserving his lovely secimens.When the garden is discovered, a survivor is brought in for questioning. FBI agents Victor Hanoverian and Brandon Eddison are tasked with iecing together one of the most stomach-churning cases of their careers. But the girl, known only as Maya, roves to be a uzzle herself.As her story twists and turns, slowly shedding light on life in the Butterfly Garden, Maya reveals old grudges, new saviors, and horrific tales of a man who’d go to any length to hold beauty cative. But the more she shares, the more the agents have to wonder what she’s still hiding…
